form.privacy_content:
Privacy Policy

Our law firm respects your privacy and is committed to protecting the personal data you provide to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

  • Data Collection: We collect only necessary information (name, phone, email) to communicate with you regarding your legal matter.
  • Data Use: Your information is used exclusively to respond to your inquiry and provide legal advice. We do not share it with third parties without your explicit consent, unless required by law.
  • Security: We take all necessary technical measures to ensure the security of your data.
  • Rights: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your information by contacting us.

By completing the contact form, you consent to the processing of your data in accordance with this policy.
form.privacy_full_body:
The protection of your personal data is important to us. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your information.

1. Information Collection

We collect information that you provide to us directly via the contact form, such as your name, email, and phone number, for the purpose of serving your legal requests.

2. Use of Information

Your information is used exclusively to communicate with you and provide the legal services you requested. We do not share your data with third parties without your consent.

3. Security

We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures for the security of your data against unauthorized access or loss.

4. Your Rights

You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data that we maintain. Please contact us for any related request.
